评论概述: My new favorite for casual wear and pickleball!
评论详情: Light weight, sweatshirt type fabric. True knee length. Well made. Not see thru (the white one). Shorts underneath are mesh, cool but covering! Great value for the $ and I'm going to buy multiple colors!!!

I am not a shorts girl.  I personally am self conscious of my large thighs, thanks to my Russian, German, and Iralian ancestors.  I inherited the short and chubby thigh genes.  I like skorts because the lining keeps some thigh from rubning. Chub rub is real!!  Most skorts are on thevery short side, so if sitting they do not give a good coverage.  If you think it is just a skirt, it looks a bit inappropriate. I usually size up on skorts just to get a little more length and more linin as thigh barrier.  Since skort are my go too, I  wear them gardening, out with family, bbq, and want to for church, though they are often to short for that.  Some are also heavy material, like jeans.  It is not a lighter fabric, but more year round.  I was so excited to find these!  I have worn them sooooo much in the month I have had them.  Fabric is soft and light weight, but not see through.  The short linning is longer than standard shorts.  I no longer have to worry about the skorts riding up.  These go day to night, depends on what you pair with.  They have gone from long car rides, to running errands, gardening, even going to church.  This item is so versatile!  My mom even wants a pair now.  I will be getting more of these in the future.  I cannot tell you how happy I am with these.  They also are comfy for long rides/trips.  I am had many surgeries and am going back on chemo.  They feel great on skin that I have texture sensitivity with and soft for chemo sensitivity and possible long infussions!

I need to order one in every color. This checks all the boxes. Modesty: it is a great length to be grown up and modest. It does ride up a bit when you sit down, so if you are looking for "Pentecostal level" modest, this is not going to be long enough. Value: great price, good product. Cool and very comfortable. I don't want to wear anything else. It has pockets! The only downside is the cheap jersey fabric which pilled up quite a bit after the first wash. It only looked dressy and classy for the first wear. If you are looking for something "put together" or looking for a moderately dressy occasion, this is not it. It looks casual and sporty. If you desire A more modest alternative to wearing shorts or if you want to feel like you are wearing sweat pants only cooler (in both senses) this is what you need. The size was on the smaller side of just right. I wear a 16 and this was a body hugging but acceptable fit. I will probably size up next time, though. If you are slim or if you have skinny legs, this will probably hang well on you at your regular size. If you are pear shaped, big thighed and/or wish to conceal a belly, you might want to size up. It has a tie waist which will help if your waist is relatively small.
I’m a critique when it comes to skirts. So far I like the color and length, good quality for a casual skirt. I like the feel of the fabric. True to size and not extremely tight.

Best skort I have ever has bought in tan/khaki and black.  Light and comfortable.  I'm not sure I would use this for something where it would show moisture bc these are more of a t shirt material.  I ordered 3 different brands and only kept these. The shorts are not visible under the skirt, but they are long and will not ride up.  This is a great choice if your thighs rub or chafe.

Ok... so this skort is really cute on. I'm fairly short (almost 5' tall) and ordered a 2x. I probably could have ordered a 1x and been fine, so maybe it runs a little big on the hips, but not bad at all. The skirt falls slightly below my knee (because I'm short) but I'm OK with that because I would prefer my legs be covered anyways. I love the pockets and the length of the shorts under the skirt.  The problem is that when you wash and dry it, SOMEHOW the entire waistband gets twisted up and the drawstring gets wrapped around the twisted waistband (internally). I have to meticulously maneuver the string and the waistband to straighten them out each time I wash and dry. If I don't do this, the waistband does not lay flat and using the drawstring scrunched the fabric up oddly on the side.  Could I lay flat to dry? Sure. Been there and done that. But the waistband still gets twisted in the washer, too. Plus, these are athleisure so washing and drying should be a given. I have them in gray and black, and I will keep wearing them because they are comfortable and cute, but I will also cramp my hands up fixing the waistband every time they go in the wash.

These “shorts” are so comfortable and look so good. I get compliments every time I wear them. I bought three and wore them frequently this summer to casual family and church events.  The material is soft and of good quality.  They wash well too.

I ordered several of these for my daughter for school. She loves them, very comfortable and a modest length. They have built in shorts and pockets which she loves. Only thing i don't like is the waist band, the elastic sometimes seems to twist up inside but it doesn't seem to bother my daughter too much.

I bought this for a trip to Europe. The skirt is knee length which was exactly what I was looking for. Rolled up nicely in my luggage and did not wrinkle. I ordered my regular size and fit well. It is elastic so not really an issue.

This skirt is perfect for just lounging around and running errands while looking like you dressed up a little. It’s very comfortable like lounge shorts with a stretchy cotton. The only problem is it got a tiny hole after a few times wearing them and  they are the kind of material that sticks to itself like a microfiber cloth.

评论概述: A little on the warm side
评论详情: Wish it was all cotton as it makes me a little hot. The shorts underneath have no stretch to them unfortunately. Otherwise, a great addition to the wardrobe.

I work with little kids and can't wear skirts for all the sitting on the floor and picking up things I do.  These solve that problem while looking nice and keeping my thighs a comfortable temperature.
wore it on a car trip. It was hot and we had a dog with us. There was a lot of in and out of the car, so the shorts were a plus.

评论概述: More of a pencil skirt than an A-line
评论详情: This was a really great concept for a skort that was a bit longer-length and attempts to be flattering. However, I am a curvy person and found that the cut was a bit more pencil-style than A-line. It really didn’t look great. I normally wear a size Large in shorts/skirts. I ordered an extra Large and it was simultaneously bulky and tight - both in all the wrong places. On the positive side, the built in shorts were comfortable and flowy- not skin-tight bicycle style shorts like most skorts out there have underneath.
Perfect length for someone working with students. Pockets!!!
Stylish and comfortable, nice colors

I recently had an injury & have a splint from my knee to toes. The skort was perfect!  Doesn't interfere with my injury & made it easy for follow up doctor appointments.  Very comfortable & wash well; did nor shrink.  I do recommend tying a larger knot on the strings as the slits they come through do not have a grommet so they can easily revert inward. When I washed it, the elastic waist band turned & I had to flatten back out.  Looking forward to using in summer in lieu of shorts.
Perfect length, very soft, the shorts don’t ride up. I think I could have gotten a large.
Good length and not see thru.very comfy.  I would say true to size
I am not impressed by the fabric. Cheaply made for the amount of money I paid for it. Fabric is almost see through.
It fits great, does not wrinkle and perfect for Summer!

评论概述: Loved So Much I Bought Another Pair
评论详情: I bought the burgundy first and wore them for a year, then came back to buy a black pair. I really like how comfortable these are and the pockets are a great size for a phone.

I live in skorts. Pants are too hot. Skirts do not lend themselves to working outside with children… I have multiple brands. This one compares to a Jack Smith skort. Nice quality. Shorts underneath fit nicely and aren’t too tight. Love the color of these!
Very comfortable and cute! I get a lot of compliments on it! Love the built in shorts too!

评论概述: Very comfortable.  Nice and cool to wear on a hot day.
评论详情: I was looking for something cute but that would not be so hot to wear to the rodeo knowing that I was going to be sitting in 100 degree weather.  This Tennis skirt was perfect for it.

This skort is super comfortable and lightweight for summer. I like also how the shorts underneath stay down and I don’t have to pull at them like some skorts I have. I am going to buy more in other colors.
Product as described
Quite comfortable. Just as pictured.
Well made and is very comfortable.

评论概述: perfect for a dressy look in the heat
评论详情: The size was true to my size and they are perfect for a warmer outdoor event where you still want to look nice - they have pockets that are a bit to small for my phone
I love this skirt. It’s got a nice stretchy material to it, which makes it very comfortable. I also like the look of it.

Comfortable and somewhat cute looking.  I have not worn out yet.  I am concerned the skirt is going to cling to the shorts.  The material is on the cheap side, see through and seems like it will pill up easily.  Expensive for the quality of the material.

I own this now in 4 colors. It’s dressier yet so comfortable. It has pockets and the modesty (and thigh coverage) of shorts under the skirt. While the skirt is slightly less-than-opaque, I am not worried. (I usually wear a slip under almost everything. I’m rather modest.) I’m tall and it comes to my knees so my students aren’t seeing more than they should. I might buy more colors.

评论概述: Exactly what I've been looking for. Could wear them everyday!
评论详情: I am 5'5'' 155 pounds. Both XL and L fit. These are super cute and I love the built in shorts without the additional waste band of wearing shorts underneath. Exactly what I've been looking for! Length sits just in the middle of my knees. They are soft and good quality, not too thick and not see through.
A little shorter than pictured, but it has nice draw strings and good quality.

I’m a teacher and I’m not allowed to wear shorts, but I could wear a skirt. I purchased this to wear to work and nobody knew. I didn’t like wearing skirts because it’s not practical and might not be appropriate if I’m bending down or needing to sit on the floor. This allowed me to wear shorts undercover.  They’re comfortable.
I like it and I got lots of compliments when I wear it
I will order more of these. They fit great and are very comfortable. The length is more suitable than others I have purchased.
They are very comfortable they fit just as described. I love wearing them, especially when we walk the beach or when I ride my bike.
This seems like a good product, I ordered a 3x skort but a 2x skort was sent in a 3x bag. 🙁 The vender is working to fix it.
Love the way they fit
I paired this with a Disney shirt. Even after walking all day, the skort was comfortable and casual. The colors are bright and pretty.

评论概述: comfortable but the inner shorts kept riding up
评论详情: I wear a 3x so bought these to wear to the Disney parks to avoid chub-rub. I figured the mesh shorts on the inside would provide great breathing material (it did) but they kept riding up. I ended up walking through the park constantly pulling the inner shorts down. The drawstring also came undone and got lost in the waistband. I can feel the aglets but cannot find the miniscule hole that must be somewhere within the elastic band to allow them to come back outside the shorts.
Fits great!

The skort fits better than expected.  It is a longer length which is what I was looking for.  It is very lightweight but not flimsy.  My directions said dry clean only, but I have washed them several times on cold and dried on low and they have not shrunk.  It even has pockets which is a definite plus.  I liked the navy one and bought the dark gray.  Very pleased with my purchase.  Only downside for me is the fabric attracts dog hair.
Love they are cotton and super comfy. And the shorts are mesh so super light weight and breathable
This skirt looks nice, fits well, washes well, packs well and can be worn with sneakers & tshirt or heels & blouse! Ordered a couple more!

I ordered this for vacation. It’s a lightweight fabric with shorts under the skirt so no worries about windy weather. It even has pockets! It packed well and looked good, no matter what shoes and top I wore with it.

评论概述: Good quality, but too short for me
评论详情: - doesn’t show panties - is NOT see through - is very comfortable and totally adjustable with drawstrings - perfect khaki color (true to image) - very breathable (good for a summer day) - haven’t tried washing just yet (but assuming it’s cotton, it probably can be hand washed and hand dried well!) - roomy pockets! - but, it’s personally too short for me and I’d prefer to either wear it with khaki leggings underneath or possibly just around the house.  9.5/10 🙂.
It’s thin and comfy. But material piles some after washing.
A great fit true to size and comfortable.

I loveeee this skirt! It’s a good length, and super cute, and the shorts underneath and long enough. I do wish the material was a little bit thicker since you can kind of see your panty line, but besides that, I can work with the kiddos at work all day and stay comfy! Definitely recommend and might buy more in the future!😄👍
Modest, comfortable.  Comes to your knee.
VERY COMFORTABLE AND Easy to care for
Just as described, perfect color. Pretty see-through to the shorts underneath. I am nervous that drying it will shrink it, but right out of the box it fits perfectly.

This skirt has changed my life. I'm in that stage where I'm either extremely hot or cold at work. I don't want to wear pants just yet because it's too nice out and I still have a bit of a tan on the legs. I literally have this skirt now in 3 colors.
I love this skort . Good for working in the yard. Good for walking my dogs .
Material is kinda flimsy, skirt was longer than expected. Not really practical for working out in.
Nice fit until you wash it, shrinks. Color faded a bit already. Still, comfortable to wear at most events
I was looking for a skort that hit right at my knee. This was too short for me. I'm 5'8" and it hit mid thigh. However I liked the khaki color and overall look of the skirt. Just not for me.
I was hoping that this was going to be "it."  Unfortunately, it isn't.  The fabric is THIN and shows everything.  I'd return it if I could.
Love them, fits good and they feel so comfy

This was so comfortable to wear. I purchased to wear on our Disney trip and it left me feeling stylish, and I didn't have to worry about feeling uncomfortable walking around the park all day. Fit was accurate! Very well made, and great material.
Comfy and fits great!
This is an attractive skort and comfortable to wear while vacationing
Order a smaller size for the perfect fit. Cool and sexy.
The fabric is unlike any I've ever had before.  Will have to see how it wears.
Perfect for if you don’t feel comfortable in short but want something cool. These hit just above the knee which is a bit too long for me. But I still wear them often.
I love this skirt. It fits very comfortably and has pockets! Comes to the knee, and the skorts help my legs not chafe
This fabric is so much more comfortable than the other skorts I’ve purchased on Amazon. Fit seems pretty true to size but the style makes them look a little larger when on. Very comfortable.

Glad I followed the measurement guide in the photos. I’m a 14/16 and got the 2xl based upon the measurement guide and it fits perfectly. Hits at the top of my knees.  Very comfortable! I ordered 2 more after receiving the first one!
Would not recommend buying. Great fit, and style, But the fabric peeled/piled, whatever the term is,  up after two washes and I’m one day passed my return window. ugh..
Got for work. Very nice fit, biker shorts made underneath. Didn’t have to get additional pair which was great. Nice length. Pleased with skirt.
Trick skirt is what my young girls used to call skorts!  I ended up with 2, because they are cool, comfortable, stylish, and modest.
I bought one size up (3x).  The waist feels a little snug, but otherwise the skorts fit great.  The material is a soft and light fabric.
Talk about comfy! I can wear this and look a bit dressed up, without feeling like it.

I only want to wear these skirts from now on. I have tried to by each color offered because they are so comfortable and look great too. The shorts underneath are so light and airy as well as discreet. Please keep offering this product!
The first time I washed this skort the waist band twisted all up a big pain to fix so you can wear it again.
Did not work for me fabric a little flimsy
Great quality for the money I would definitely buy one of these again

The shorts underneath are tight and the material is not very stretchy and the outer skirt is very loose and long. It is not flattering at all. Way better than I expected!
Everything about it worked out great
I ordered 2 different colors one being black. The first one fit perfectly. Then the black was a little tighter. Disappointed

Loved the skirt until I washed it. Somehow the elastic is twisted and I have to yet to figure out how to untwist it.
I wish the fabric of the skirt was a little thicker.

评论详情: Great fit,right length.
They are thin shirt material and don't wash up very well. Little balls form after washing
Runs very small

I now own several of these skirts because they are cute, comfortable & very practical for any occasion.  However, the waistband has a major design flaw...the elastic does NOT want to stay put! What I mean by this is, when washed, the elastic in the waistband twists and has to be put back into place before the next use. I think it could have been solved with a few extra stitches around the waistband to keep it in place without hindering the elastic nature. Don't get Mr wrong, I'll still wear them, and even have purchased more in different colors because they are so comfortable, but it does get frustrating when you have to fix it everytime you pull it out of the laundry!
The material was too clingy to the attached shorts.
Skirt was like a square shape. Fit right in the waist but did not meet my expectations. Shorts underneath were two different widths and you could see straight thru it. Not the one for me.
The skirt clung to the shorts.
Before washing the skirt was full of pills. The quality is not good.

I have never found a short skirt that I love but THIS skirt is fabulous!  I also don’t ever take the time to write reviews but I have to tell you that as a large 200 pound size 16/18 wide bottomed woman….this skirt ROCKS!
